```{r}
library(vpdsus)

panel <- vpdsus_example_panel()

sA <- estimate_susceptible_static(panel, coverage_col = "coverage", pop_col = "pop_0_4")
mod <- make_modelling_panel(panel, sA, outcome = "outbreak_pc", lag_years = 1)

fit <- fit_outbreak_models(mod)
fit$coefficients

evaluate_models(mod)
```
